ci_support_win_64_python3.10.____cpython:
c_compiler:
- vs2019
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- vs2019
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
rust_compiler:
- rust
target_platform:
- win-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.description:
This can be used in race condition situations where a process has opened a
folder and it tries to delete it just before closing the original handle.
This function will close all the handles of all the processes that have
opened the requested file or directory, thus it may cause unexpected
behavior on other programs or could leave your file system on an
inconsistent state. USE THIS UNDER YOUR OWN RISK.
about.summary: Force-delete a file or folder held by other Windows processes

name: force-delete-win
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "force-delete-win" %}
{% set version = "0.1.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}/{{ name.replace('-', '_') }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: d00fcc3f6266ea52668839fcb941a6aa2fe13854a94e96bf9b65918ca6d90607

build:
  skip: true  # [not win]
  number: 3

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ compiler('rust') }}
    - cargo-bundle-licenses
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - maturin
    - toml
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - force_delete_win
  requires:
    - pip
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/andfoy/force-delete-win
  summary: 'Force-delete a file or folder held by other Windows processes'
  description: |
    This can be used in race condition situations where a process has opened a
    folder and it tries to delete it just before closing the original handle.
    This function will close all the handles of all the processes that have
    opened the requested file or directory, thus it may cause unexpected
    behavior on other programs or could leave your file system on an
    inconsistent state. USE THIS UNDER YOUR OWN RISK.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: 
    - LICENSE
    - THIRDPARTY.yml

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - andfoy
    - steff456

about.description:
This can be used in race condition situations where a process has opened a
folder and it tries to delete it just before closing the original handle.
This function will close all the handles of all the processes that have
opened the requested file or directory, thus it may cause unexpected

inconsistent state. USE THIS UNDER YOUR OWN RISK.
about.summary: Force-delete a file or folder held by other Windows processes
